description: A personal project that I developed in the front-end framework Vue.js. Local Events provide a way for users to search for events happening within, or near, a location or zipcode. The results are displayed in a list and on a Google Map with markers indicating where the events are located. Clicking on a marker will display the description of the event. Also, clicking on an item from the list will show where that specific event is located on the map.
name: Local Events

description: A full-stack personal project that I developed in the MEVN (MongoDB, Express.js, Vue.js, Node.js) stack. MTG Price Scraper is a CRUD wishlist applcation that scrapes the web for Magic: the Gathering trading card prices. Prices are updated daily in 4 hour increments by a Node.js script that runs on a local server; price updates are sent to MongoDB Atlas in the cloud.
name: MTG Price Scraper
